name: Framed Wings
description: Framed Wings is an indie action adventure RPG inspired by the Zelda game series. Take your sword and slash through countless enemies, explore caves and dungeons, complete quests, solve challenging puzzles, and slay formidable bosses.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 98, XP, Vista, 7, 8 Processor: Intel Pentium III 800 MHz Memory: 500 MB RAM Storage: 200 MB available space
